name: Google Reloaded 2 .de edition
description:
Google Reloaded 2 implements the style as seen on the Firefox theme Blue Ice (https://addons.mozilla.org/sv-SE/firefox/addon/3085).
This edition implements the style for the Google front page and the web search-pages only. For now, at least…

Please observe: This is the German (.de) edition!

Other editions:

google.com edition: http://userstyles.org/styles/18402

google.se edition: http://userstyles.org/styles/18423

google.co.uk edition: http://userstyles.org/styles/18424

google.it edition: http://userstyles.org/styles/18425

google.fr edition: http://userstyles.org/styles/18426

google.es edition: http://userstyles.org/styles/18429

google.no edition: http://userstyles.org/styles/18430
